name: Re:Tank
description:
Re:Tank is a game about attempting to clear the entire level of enemies. Due to the number of enemies (and consequently the number of bullets flying across the screen) survival is a long shot. However, as long as you have lives left to give, you will take over whatever enemy destroys you. 

Directions: W and S keys to drive forward and backward. A and D keys to steer left and right. Aim using your mouse.

Keep an eye out for hearts! Collecting them will heal you.

I hope everyone enjoys playing it as much as I enjoyed making it.

(It's pretty bare bones and It's not very well balanced so I'm sorry about that x_x)

Credits:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music...

Programming: Dakota Hall
